sentences.v: 我一路快跑冲过狂热的甲虫，经过一条长廊通向二楼，我在往西面的楼梯下去，来到一楼，我感到心情愉快，好像处在早期动作侦探时代一样。

sentences.v: 结核病在世界上某些地区仍很常见。
sentences.tran: Tuberculosis is still common in some parts of the world .

sentences.v: 当时中国是世界上最强大的国家。
sentences.tran: At that time China was the most powerful country in the world .

sentences.v: 泰姬陵吸引了来自世界各地的游客。
sentences.tran: The Taj Mahal attracts visitors from around the world .

sentences.v: 世界各地的学生到牛津大学来求学。
sentences.tran: Students from all over the world come to study at Oxford.

sentences.v: 全世界的孩子都一样。
sentences.tran: Children are the same the world over .

sentences.v: 这本书已在世界各地出版。
sentences.tran: The book has been published throughout the world .

sentences.v: 世界上任何地方都找不出和它类似的东西。
sentences.tran: There is nothing quite like it anywhere in the world .

sentences.v: 欧洲和世界上其他地区的关系
sentences.tran: Europe’s relationship with the rest of the world

sentences.v: 我决定休息一年去周游世界。

sentences.v: 震惊全世界的罪行
sentences.tran: a crime that shocked the world

sentences.tran: When I grew out of my jacket,I gave it to my little brother.

phrases.v: 羽绒服；鸭绒衣；羽绒夹克
晚礼服；无尾礼服；小礼服；礼服夹克（等于tuxedo）
猎装；便装上衣；（男子在非正式场合穿的）粗花呢西装外套

trans.en: a piece of clothing that covers the upper part of your body and your arms, usually has a collar, and is fastened at the front by buttons

sentences.v: 我上班要穿衬衫打领带。
sentences.tran: I have to wear a shirt and tie to work.

sentences.v: 格子衬衫
sentences.tran: a check shirt

phrases.v: [口]妄自尊大的人；自命不凡的人；道貌岸然的人
法兰绒衬衫；法兰绒上衣
n. T恤；短袖圆领运动衫（等于T-shirt）

memory: 衬衫(shirt)可以搭配裙子(skirt)穿

trans.en: used when speaking or writing to one or more people to refer to something that belongs to them or is connected with them

sentences.v: 这是我们的房间，你们的在走廊那边。
sentences.tran: This is our room, and yours is just across the hall.

sentences.v: 许多人有财务问题，不过你的问题比大多数人的要严重。
sentences.tran: A lot of people have money problems, but yours are more serious than most people’s.

sentences.v: 一万英镑的奖金或一辆新车——随你选择。
sentences.tran: A cash prize of £10,000 or a new car – the choice is yours.

trans.en: used to ask which person or people a particular thing belongs to

sentences.v: 这是谁的？
sentences.tran: Whose is this?

sentences.v: 那些钥匙是谁的？
sentences.tran: Whose keys are those?

trans.en: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to something that belongs to or is connected with himself or herself

sentences.v: 这是格伦的主意，不是我的。
sentences.tran: It was Glen’s idea, not mine.

sentences.v: “那是你的车吗？”“不是，我的车停在路对面。”
sentences.tran: ‘Is that your car?’ ‘No, mine is parked over the road.’

sentences.v: 你的腿很美——我的腿太细了。
sentences.tran: You’ve got good legs – mine are too thin.

sentences.v: 他英语比我好。
sentences.tran: His English is better than mine.

ws.tran: 矿物；（英）矿泉水；无机物；苏打水（常用复数表示）
使成矿（mineralize的过去式和过去分词）
使含无机化合物；使矿物化

phrases.v: 酸性矿水排水；排泄酸性矿水

synos.tran: 矿，矿藏；矿山，矿井；地雷，水雷

ws.tran: （常用来构成复合词）充满…的，塞满了…的
可捆扎的；可打包的；可压紧的
包，包裹；套装软件，[计] 程序包
包装机；包装工人；罐头食品工人，赶牲口运货的人
包装；把…装袋（package的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.v: 一包；（野兽等的）一群；一盒
塞进；挤进；塞满了东西；某地方挤满了人
冰袋；大片浮冰；[医]冰裹法
n. （海上相互重叠的）浮冰块，积冰
罩板包装（硬底上有凸起透明罩的物品包装）
不可靠的人，有敛癖的人

synos.tran: [包装]包装；一群；背包；[临床]包裹；一副
[包装]包装；压紧；捆扎；挑选；塞满
挤；包装货物；[包装]被包装；群集

memory: 该词的“包裹”一义大家应该比较熟悉

trans.en: to stay somewhere or not do something until something else happens, someone arrives etc

sentences.v: 快点！大家在等着呢。
sentences.tran: Hurry up! Everyone’s waiting.

sentences.v: 你在外面等好吗？
sentences.tran: Would you mind waiting outside?

sentences.v: 我们已经等了很长时间了。
sentences.tran: We’ve been waiting ages.

phrases.v: 请稍候，请稍等；请您稍候；正在暖机等待结束再开始使用

trans.en: a piece of clothing that you wear on your hand in order to protect it or keep it warm

sentences.v: 一副手套
sentences.tran: a pair of gloves

sentences.v: 拳击手套
sentences.tran: boxing gloves

ws.tran: 给…戴手套；给…当手套用（glove的过去分词）

phrases.v: 外柔内刚；表面温和的东西
手套箱；手套式操作箱（真空设备用）
(向…)应战；接受(…的)挑战[亦作 gantlet]
n. （汽车仪表板上的）贮物箱
认真地;毫不留情地[亦作 without gloves]

memory: g(音似： 歌)+love(爱情)→冬日里送手套是对爱情的歌颂→手套

trans.en: a piece of cloth that you wear around your neck, head, or shoulders, especially to keep warm

sentences.v: 喂， 你的围巾快掉了。
sentences.tran: Hey, your scarf is slipping off.

sentences.v: 围巾轻拂着她的脸。
sentences.tran: The scarf flapped her face.

sentences.v: 她用围巾围住脖子。
sentences.tran: She muffled her throat with a scarf.

synos.tran: [服装]围巾；嵌接，嵌接处；头巾领巾

memory: 这条围巾(scarf)的手艺(craft)真棒

trans.en: an object that you use to protect yourself against rain or hot sun. It consists of a circular folding frame covered in cloth.

sentences.v: 开始下雨了，所以特里西娅停下来撑起雨伞。
sentences.tran: It started to rain, so Tricia stopped to put up her umbrella.

sentences.v: 那天我就在海滩上度过，躺在海滩遮阳伞下面看书。
sentences.tran: I spent the day on the beach, lying under a beach umbrella, reading.

phrases.v: n. （美）遮阳伞（海滨或花园用的）

synos.tran: 雨伞；保护伞；庇护；伞形结构

trans.en: dark glasses that you wear to protect your eyes when the sun is very bright

sentences.v: 你觉得我的新太阳镜怎么样？
sentences.tran: What do you think of my new sunglasses?

sentences.v: 我该挑一副什么颜色的太阳镜呢？
sentences.tran: What color should I choose for my sunglasses?

sentences.v: 我看不到她的眼睛，但是能看到她露在太阳镜上面的眉毛。
sentences.tran: I can’t see her eyes, but I can see her eyebrows above the sunglasses.

ws.tran: 漂亮地，可爱地；恰如其分地

phrases.v: 漂亮男孩；脂粉气十足的男人；矫揉造作的男子
一大笔钱；大数目之金钱
[美国俚语]容易的；便当的；合算的

trans.en: costing a lot of money

sentences.v: 城里最贵的餐馆
sentences.tran: the most expensive restaurant in town

sentences.v: 汽油越来越贵了。
sentences.tran: Petrol is becoming more and more expensive.

sentences.v: 摄影是一项很花钱的业余爱好。
sentences.tran: Photography is an expensive hobby.

sentences.v: 对于低收入家庭来说，儿童的安全设备贵得让人望而却步。
sentences.tran: For low-income families, children’s safety equipment can be prohibitively expensive (= so expensive that most people cannot afford it ).

sentences.v: 用错建筑工人有时会是代价高昂的错误。
sentences.tran: Employing the wrong builder can be a horribly expensive mistake.

sentences.v: 她丈夫喜欢的东西都很贵。
sentences.tran: Her husband had expensive tastes (= liked expensive things ).

memory: ex + pens(花费) + ive → 昂贵的

trans.en: not at all expensive, or lower in price than you expected

sentences.v: 便宜的火车票
sentences.tran: cheap rail fares

sentences.v: 市场上最便宜的电视机
sentences.tran: the cheapest TV on the market

sentences.v: 西班牙的房地产比这里便宜。
sentences.tran: Property is cheaper in Spain than here.

sentences.v: 廉价商店
sentences.tran: a cheap shop (= one that sells goods cheaply )

sentences.v: 这种设备相对比较便宜，而且操作简单。
sentences.tran: The equipment is relatively cheap and simple to use.

sentences.v: 这件外套超便宜。
sentences.tran: This coat was dirt cheap (= very cheap – an informal expression 非正式用语 ) .

phrases.v: [口]觉得身体不舒服；感到惭愧
低利借款；来得容易的非正当收入；在钱上好商量的人

synos.tran: [贸易]便宜的；小气的；不值钱的

trans.en: pleasant, attractive, or enjoyable

sentences.v: 他们的房子真漂亮。
sentences.tran: They’ve got a very nice house.

sentences.v: 你们玩得开心吗？
sentences.tran: Did you have a nice time?

sentences.v: 天气真好，为什么不去游泳呢？
sentences.tran: It’s such a nice day (= good weather ), why not go for a swim?

sentences.v: 真是个惊喜！
sentences.tran: What a nice surprise!

sentences.v: 圣诞节的一个好处是全家可以聚首一堂。
sentences.tran: One of the nice things about Christmas is having all the family together.

ws.tran: 精密；美好；细节；拘泥细节

phrases.v: 很高兴认识你；很高兴见到你

synos.tran: 精密的；美好的；细微的；和蔼的

trans.en: If you try on a piece of clothing, you put it on to see if it fits you or if it looks nice

sentences.v: 衣服和鞋要试穿以确保它们合适。
sentences.tran: Try on clothing and shoes to make sure they fit.

trans.en: how big or small something is

sentences.v: 他是个小男孩，个子和约翰差不多。
sentences.tran: He’s a small boy, about John’s size.

sentences.v: 詹森的房子和我们的差不多大。
sentences.tran: Jensens’ house is about the same size as ours.

sentences.v: 这条狗体型很大，但还没有长足。
sentences.tran: He’s quite a big dog, but he’s still not full size yet.

ws.tran: 相比（size的过去分词）；按大小分类

phrases.v: 粒度分布；粒径分布；大小分布；径谱
孔径；孔隙大小；气孔尺寸
尺寸效应；规模效果；晶粒尺寸效应
人口规模；人口数量；群体大小

trans.en: used to show that other people probably already know what you are saying is true, or expect to hear it

sentences.v: 噢，当然是她赢啦。
sentences.tran: Well, she won, of course.

sentences.v: 你当然应该保留所有信函的复印件。
sentences.tran: You should of course keep copies of all your correspondence.

sentences.v: 今后当然会有遇到困难的时候。
sentences.tran: Of course there will be some difficult times ahead.

trans.en: more than is acceptable or possible

sentences.v: 你觉得音乐太响了吗？
sentences.tran: Do you think the music’s too loud?

sentences.v: 你往汤里放盐太多。
sentences.tran: You’ve put too much salt in the soup.

sentences.v: 路上车辆太多。
sentences.tran: There are too many cars on the road.

trans.en: exactly

sentences.v: 我现在正需要喝一杯浓浓的咖啡。
sentences.tran: A good strong cup of coffee is just what I need right now.

sentences.v: 那幢房子大而宽敞，正合我们的需要。
sentences.tran: The house was large and roomy; just right for us.

sentences.v: 她看上去就像她妈妈。
sentences.tran: She looks just like her mother.

sentences.v: 你究竟想干什么？
sentences.tran: Just what do you think you’re trying to do?

sentences.v: 洗个舒服的热水澡，那正是缓解肌肉酸痛的好方法。
sentences.tran: A nice hot bath – just the thing(= exactly the right thing ) to relax sore muscles.

ws.tran: 有正当理由的；合乎情理的；事出有因的
可辩解的，有道理的；可证明为正当的
无可非议地；言之有理地
公正地；正当地；恰当地；正直地
调整（justify的过去分词）；证明…正当

phrases.v: 就在那时，正当那时；正在那时
还是；完全一样；照旧（等于all the same）

synos.tran: 只是，仅仅；刚才，刚刚；正好，恰好；实在；刚要
[法]公正的，合理的；正直的，正义的；正确的；公平的；应得的

memory: 伸张正义(just)， 势在必(must)行

sentences.v: 算计算计买这么多东西要多少钱。
sentences.tran: Work out how much all these things will cost.

sentences.v: 问题不在于你读了多少书，而在于你读了哪些有价值的书。
sentences.tran: It is not how much you read but what you read that counts.

trans.en: the number 80

sentences.v: 我考了八十几分.
sentences.tran: I got an eighty something.

sentences.v: 祭司亚撒利雅率领耶和华勇敢的祭司八十人，跟随他进去。
sentences.tran: Azariah the priest with eighty other courageous priests of the Lord followed him in.

synos.tran: 八十的，八十个的；八十岁的

trans.en: the standard unit of money in the US, Canada, Australia, and some other countries, divided into 100  cent s  : symbol $

sentences.v: 它要三美元。
sentences.tran: It cost three dollars.

sentences.v: 一张十元钞票
sentences.tran: a ten-dollar bill

sentences.v: 在机场你可以使用美元或欧元。
sentences.tran: You can pay in dollars or euros at the airport.

memory: 用dollar(美元)买doll(玩具)

trans.en: when you sell something

sentences.v: 哈维每做成一笔生意可得到50美元的佣金。
sentences.tran: Harvey gets a $50 commission every time he makes a sale (= sells something as part of his job ) .

sentences.v: 汽车推销员常常宁愿降价也不愿失去一笔生意。
sentences.tran: Car salesmen will often bring down the price rather than lose a sale (= fail to sell something ) .

sentences.v: 对伊朗的军火销售
sentences.tran: arms sales to Iran

ws.tran: 畅销的；适于销售的；价格适当的

phrases.v: 宅前旧货出售；在私家车库进行的家中旧货出售

synos.tran: 销售；[贸易]出售；拍卖；销售额；廉价出售

memory: 出海航行(sail)的船票已经卖(sale)光了

trans.en: You use more to indicate that there is a greater amount of something than before or than average, or than something else. You can use "a little," "a lot," "a bit," "far," and "much" in front of more.

sentences.v: 越来越多的人在心脏病发作后存活下来。
sentences.tran: More and more people are surviving heart attacks.

sentences.v: 他用更多的时间来完善他的舞蹈动作而不是健身。
sentences.tran: He spent more time perfecting his dance moves instead of gym work.

phrases.v: 更多信息；详细信息；更多资料
需要更多信息；取得进一步资讯

trans.en: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself and one or more other people

sentences.v: 请帮助我们。
sentences.tran: Please help us.

sentences.v: 他安排我们大家一起喝一杯。
sentences.tran: He arranged for us all to have a drink.

sentences.v: 我们俩她都请了。
sentences.tran: She’s invited us both.

sentences.v: 我妈要来和我们同住。
sentences.tran: My mother is coming to stay with us.

sentences.v: 现在就给我们捐款吧。
sentences.tran: Send us a donation now.
